title: Atho Vanile Nila Lyrics Isai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Atho Vanile Nila Lyrics From Isai
Singer: Karthik, Chinmayi and Deva | Lyrics: Karky

Atho vanile
nila pogudhey
edhai thaedi thaedi.

adhai ketkalaam
thunaiyaagave
ennodu vaa nee.

Atho vanile nila
edhai thaedudho nila

Atho vanile
nila pogudhey
adhan jodi thaedi.

Thanakkaettra oru
thunai yaarena
malai melae aeri.

Tunai kidathapin
thunai thaedina
sarithaana kooru

Inaiyaana thunai
sariya? ena
sariparthal nandru.

Atho vanile
nila pogudhey
edhai thaedi thaedi.

Atho vanile
nila pogudhey
adhan jodi thaedi.

Nila mayangudhe ho
nila mayangudhe
pinbu nila thayangudhey

kolaththula neerula
kalla erinji.
valachi valchi nenja pilingi
thittam pottu theenda
thudichchaa thayangudhey.

nila thayangudhey
nila thayangudhey ho
nila mayangudhey
unna parkka thayangudhey

Nenju thunda thaaney
naanum kalla veesinen.
neeril vattam pottu
unaku valayal maattinen.

Pechu mattumthaan
perusaa irukku.
seyalil settai
kanda nilavu mirandu
irukku.

Un meralura
vizhiyayum parthaen.
andha peralura
manasayum parthaen.

Indha valarura thaeyira
valakkam yenadi.
sollu nilave
velli nilave
nillu nilave
padhil sollu nilave

Atho vanile
nila pogudhey
edhai thaedi thaedi.

Nilave nilave
velli nilave.
Kulir thulli thulli
varum nilave
nenjai killi killi
vidum nilave.
adhai alli alli
oli veesi veesi dhinam
pesum nilave.

en annai arul pettra nilave
ini anbu thamil pesu nilave
engal nilave
vaanilave.

NIla thaakkudhey ho
NIla thaakkudhey
enai paakkudhey ho
nila thaakkudhey

Veluththa paarva
nenja Â koluththa
koluththa idhalil
idhala aluththa

Oru muththam thandhu
theeya anaikkavaa

nila odivaa ohh
nila odivaa
muththam kodukkave ohh
nila odivaa

Muththam enna muththam
ennai moththam tharugirean.
Saththam indri niththam
megam meththai virikkiren.

mangai kaluththil
malaiyidavum velaivaravum
madiyil viluven
mayakka tharuvaen.

Nee pournami
aagidum podhu.
angu pani vilum
malargalin meedhu.

en uyira un
kaluthtula kayiraa
maalai sottuven
nilave maalai soottuven.
maalai soottuven
unnai manadhil koottuven.

Atho vanile
nila pogudhey
edhai thaedi thaedi.
